astre.entityDisambiguation.nest

Class NestModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • astre.entityDisambiguation.nest.NestModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NestModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Implementation of the full template model in 'Event Schema Induction with a Probabilistic Entity-Driven Model' adding an slot-attribute distribution as presented in 'Desambiguation d'entites pour l'induction non supervisee de schemas evenementiels' based on LDA implementation of Gregor Heinrich at http://www.arbylon.net/projects/LdaGibbsSampler.java
    Author:
    nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

         boolean constraint,
         boolean decomposition,
         boolean use_attribute,

         int nV_head,

         int nV_predicate,
         int nV_attribute,

         int nK_slot,
         double alpha,
         double beta_head,
         double beta_relation,
         double beta_predicate,
         double beta_attribute)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        seed - Java random seed
        constraint - Using subj|obj constraint
        decomposition - Decomposing slot-trigger distribution
        use_attribute - Using attributes
        documents - Documents
        nV_head - Entity vocabulary size
        nV_relation - Trigger vocabulary size
        nV_predicate - Predicate vocabulary size
        nV_attribute - Attribute vocabulary size
        nK_type - #event_types
        nK_slot - #slots
        alpha - Doc-slot hyper-param
        beta_head - Slot-head hyper-param
        beta_relation - Slot-trigger hyper-param
        beta_predicate - Slot-predicate hyper-param
        beta_attribute - Slot-attribute hyper-param

      • gibbs

        public void gibbs()
        Main method: Select initial state ? Repeat a large number of times: 1. Select an element 2. Update conditional on other elements. If appropriate, output summary for each run.

      • getTheta

        public double[][] getTheta()
        Retrieve estimated document--topic associations. If sample lag > 0 then the mean value of all sampled statistics for theta[][] is taken.
        Returns:
        theta multinomial mixture of document topics (M x K)

      • getDistribution

        Returns:

      • configure

        public void configure(int iterations,
             int burnIn,
             int thinInterval,
             int sampleLag)
        Configure the gibbs sampler
        Parameters:
        iterations - number of total iterations
        burnIn - number of burn-in iterations
        thinInterval - update statistics interval
        sampleLag - sample interval (-1 for just one sample at the end)

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                        org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        Parameters:
        args -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException -
        Usage: NestModel
        -alpha (optional) doc-type dirichlet (default 1)
        -att (optional) using attributes (default false)
        -beta_a (optional) att-slot dirichlet (default .1)
        -beta_h (optional) head-slot dirichlet (default 1)
        -beta_p (optional) predicate-type dirichlet (default 1)
        -beta_t (optional) trigger-slot dirichlet (default .1)
        -burn (optional) burn-in iterations (default 2000)
        -cut (optional) cut-off term frequency (default 5)
        -doc Stanford parsed documents directory
        -index output index file
        -iter (optional) number of iterations (default 10000)
        -lag (optional) sample lag (default 10)
        -model output model file
        -rand (optional) random seed (default 1)
        -slot (optional) number of slots (default 10)
        -step (optional) interval step (default 100)
        -type (optional) number of event types (default 20)
